DOC.brief_summary: Dose-response trial with a cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Timothy Grass Pollen (Phleum pratense)
DOC.brief_title: Dose-Response-Study With a Recombinant Cocktail of Phleum (rPhleum) Allergens
DOC.criteria: main symptoms of allergic rhinitis/rhinoconjunctivitis with or without controlled asthma against grass pollen allergens positive SPT positive EAST positive specific provocation test serious chronic diseases other perennial allergies
